params.asset: The asset to get the price of

returns._0: The asset price mantissa (scaled by 1e18).  Zero means the price is unavailable.

params.jToken: The jToken to get the underlying price of

returns._0: The underlying asset price mantissa (scaled by 1e18).  Zero means the price is unavailable.

getAssetPrice(address).notice: Get the price of a specific asset

getUnderlyingPrice(address).notice: Get the underlying price of a jToken asset

isPriceOracle().notice: Indicator that this is a PriceOracle contract (for inspection)
